Articles.Content:
Hi ! I want to detect if the player is currently in IVA mode, is that possible ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-19T10:36:22Z" title="05/19/2015 10:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 19, 2015</time> by simon56modder**

Hi, I've used:

    CameraManager.Instance.currentCameraMode == CameraManager.CameraMode.IVA || CameraManager.Instance.currentCameraMode == CameraManager.CameraMode.Internal

Thanks ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Enfin... merci vu que tu habites en France ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
